languages.text:
All conscious allies adjacent to the Cyber-Mastiff restore {uip|RestoredWounds|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} wounds at the start of their turn and receive {uip|DamageReduced|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727}% less damage from all sources.
Any Heroic Act used in battle fully restores the Cyber-Mastiff's wounds.

traits.locale_text:
All conscious allies adjacent to the Cyber-Mastiff restore {uip|RestoredWounds|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} wounds at the start of their turn and receive {uip|DamageReduced|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727}% less damage from all sources.
Any Heroic Act used in battle fully restores the Cyber-Mastiff's wounds.

languages.text: While an ally is still in combat and adjacent to the cyber-mastiff, they suffer −{uip|DamageReduced|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727}% less damage from all sources and regain {uip|RestoredWounds|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: While an ally is still in combat and is adjacent to the cyber-mastiff, they suffer −{uip|DamageReduced|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727}% less damage from all sources and regain {uip|RestoredWounds|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

While an ally is still in combat and adjacent to the cyber-mastiff, they suffer −{uip|DamageReduced|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727}% less damage from all sources and regain {uip|RestoredWounds|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

While an ally is still in combat and adjacent to the cyber-mastiff, they suffer −{uip|DamageReduced|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727}% less damage from all sources and regain {uip|RestoredWounds|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: Союзник на соседней клетке с кибермастифом получает на {uip|DamageReduced|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727}% меньше урона из любого источника и восстанавливает {uip|RestoredWounds|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} в начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} (если у него больше 0 здоровья).
languages.original_text: While an ally is still in combat and is adjacent to the cyber-mastiff, they suffer −{uip|DamageReduced|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727}% less damage from all sources and regain {uip|RestoredWounds|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Союзник, остающийся в бою на соседней клетке с кибермастифом, получает на {uip|DamageReduced|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727}% меньше урона из любого источника и восстанавливает {uip|RestoredWounds|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} единиц {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} в начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

Союзник, остающийся в бою на соседней клетке с кибермастифом, получает на {uip|DamageReduced|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727}% меньше урона из любого источника и восстанавливает {uip|RestoredWounds|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} единиц {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} в начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

Союзник на соседней клетке с кибермастифом получает на {uip|DamageReduced|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727}% меньше урона из любого источника и восстанавливает {uip|RestoredWounds|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} в начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} (если у него больше 0 здоровья).

languages.text: 味方が戦闘中でサイバーマスチフに隣接している間、受けるダメージが -{uip|DamageReduced|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727}%減少し、自分の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に {uip|RestoredWounds|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727}の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を回復する。

traits.locale_text: 味方が戦闘中でサイバーマスチフに隣接している間、受けるダメージが -{uip|DamageReduced|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727}%減少し、自分の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に {uip|RestoredWounds|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727}の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を回復する。

languages.text: Les alliés encore au combat se trouvant sur une case adjacente au cyber-mastiff subissent −{uip|DamageReduced|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} % de dégâts toutes sources confondues et récupèrent {uip|RestoredWounds|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} au début de leur {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
languages.original_text: While an ally is still in combat and adjacent to the cyber-mastiff, they suffer −{uip|DamageReduced|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727}% less damage from all sources and regain {uip|RestoredWounds|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les alliés encore au combat se trouvant sur une case adjacente au cyber-mastiff subissent −{uip|DamageReduced|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} % de dégâts toutes sources confondues et récupèrent {uip|RestoredWounds|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} au début de leur {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.

languages.text: Mientras un aliado esté en combate y adyacente al cibermastín, sufre un −{uip|DamageReduced|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} % menos de daño de cualquier origen y recupera{uip|RestoredWounds|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} al principio de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Mientras un aliado esté en combate y adyacente al cibermastín, sufre un −{uip|DamageReduced|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} % menos de daño de cualquier origen y recupera{uip|RestoredWounds|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} al principio de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.text: 当处于战斗状态下的盟友与生化獒犬临近时，该盟友承受的所有伤害降低{uip|DamageReduced|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727}%，且该盟友{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，恢复{uip|RestoredWounds|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。
languages.original_text: While an ally is still in combat and adjacent to the cyber-mastiff, they suffer −{uip|DamageReduced|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727}% less damage from all sources and regain {uip|RestoredWounds|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当处于战斗状态下的盟友与生化獒犬临近时，该盟友承受的所有伤害降低{uip|DamageReduced|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727}%，且该盟友{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，恢复{uip|RestoredWounds|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。

languages.text: Wenn ein Verbündeter noch im Kampf ist und neben dem Cyber-Mastiff steht, erleidet er −{uip|DamageReduced|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} % weniger Schaden durch alle Quellen und regeneriert zu Beginn seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} {uip|RestoredWounds|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.
languages.original_text: While an ally is still in combat and adjacent to the cyber-mastiff, they suffer −{uip|DamageReduced|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727}% less damage from all sources and regain {uip|RestoredWounds|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn ein Verbündeter noch im Kampf ist und neben dem Cyber-Mastiff steht, erleidet er −{uip|DamageReduced|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} % weniger Schaden durch alle Quellen und regeneriert zu Beginn seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} {uip|RestoredWounds|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.

languages.text: Bir dost birim, hâlâ çatışmadaysa ve siber mastifin bitişiğindeyse tüm kaynaklardan %{uip|DamageReduced|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} daha az hasar alır ve {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcında {uip|RestoredWounds|4b7781d804484271947c42e2cdbe1727} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanını geri kazanır.
